00040 #ifndef _uimenuwindow_cpp
00041 #define _uimenuwindow_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "uimenuwindow.h"
00044 #include "uimenu.h"
00045 #include "uibutton.h"
00046 #include "uilayer.h"
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     namespace UI
00051     {
00052         MenuWindow::MenuWindow(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UI::Menu* TheMenu, UILayer* Layer)
00053             : Window(Name,Position,Size,Layer),
00054               BackButton(NULL),
00055               ParentWindow(NULL),
00056               MasterMenu(TheMenu)
00057         {
00058         }
00059 
00060         MenuWindow::~MenuWindow()
00061         {
00062             while(!ChildWindows.empty())
00063             {
00064                 UI::MenuWindow* window = ChildWindows.back().second;
00065                 delete window;
00066                 ChildWindows.pop_back();
00067             }
00068         }
00069 
00070         MenuWindow* MenuWindow::GetParentWindow()
00071         {
00072             return ParentWindow;
00073         }
00074 
00075         Button* MenuWindow::CreateBackButton(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00076         {
00077             if(!BackButton && ParentWindow)
00078             {
00079                 BackButton = new Button(Name+"back",Position,Size,Parent);
00080                 Vector2 Offset = Position - RelPosition;
00081                 OffsetButtonInfo backbuttonoff(BackButton,UI::RA_AnchorMiddle,UI::RT_TetherBoth,Offset);
00082                 Buttons.push_back(backbuttonoff);
00083                 return BackButton;
00084             }
00085             return 0;
00086         }
00087 
00088         Button* MenuWindow::GetBackButton()
00089         {
00090             return BackButton;
00091         }
00092 
00093         Button* MenuWindow::CreateAccessorButton(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00094         {
00095             Vector2 Offset = Position - RelPosition;
00096             Button* AccBut = this->CreateButton(Name,Position,Size);
00097             OffsetButtonInfo buttonoff(AccBut,UI::RA_AnchorMiddle,UI::RT_TetherBoth,Offset);
00098             Buttons.push_back(buttonoff);
00099             ChildWindows.push_back(std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*>(AccBut,NULL));
00100             return buttonoff.Object;
00101         }
00102 
00103         Button* MenuWindow::GetAccessorButton(ConstString& Name)
00104         {
00105             for( std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> >::iterator it = ChildWindows.begin() ; it != ChildWindows.end() ; it++ )
00106             {
00107                 if(Name == (*it).first->GetName())
00108                 {
00109                     Button* But = (*it).first;
00110                     return But;
00111                 }
00112             }
00113             return 0;
00114         }
00115 
00116         MenuWindow* MenuWindow::GetWindowOfAccessButton(Button* Accessor)
00117         {
00118             for( std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> >::iterator it = ChildWindows.begin() ; it != ChildWindows.end() ; it++ )
00119             {
00120                 if(Accessor == (*it).first)
00121                 {
00122                     MenuWindow* MenWin = (*it).second;
00123                     return MenWin;
00124                 }
00125             }
00126             return 0;
00127         }
00128 
00129         MenuWindow* MenuWindow::CreateChildMenuWindow(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, Button* Accessor)
00130         {
00131             std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*>* AccessorPair = NULL;
00132             for( std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> >::iterator it = ChildWindows.begin() ; it != ChildWindows.end() ; it++ )
00133             {
00134                 if(Accessor == (*it).first)
00135                     AccessorPair = &(*it);
00136             }
00137             if(NULL==AccessorPair)
00138                 return 0;
00139             MenuWindow* MenWin = new MenuWindow(Name,Position,Size,MasterMenu,Parent);
00140             MenWin->ParentWindow = this;
00141             AccessorPair->second = MenWin;
00142             MenWin->Hide();
00143             return MenWin;
00144         }
00145 
00146         MenuWindow* MenuWindow::GetChildMenuWindow(ConstString& Name)
00147         {
00148             for ( std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> >::iterator it = ChildWindows.begin() ; it != ChildWindows.end() ; it++ )
00149             {
00150                 if ( Name == (*it).second->GetName() )
00151                 {
00152                     MenuWindow* menuwindow = (*it).second;
00153                     return menuwindow;
00154                 }
00155             }
00156             return 0;
00157         }
00158 
00159         MenuWindow* MenuWindow::GetChildMenuWindow(const Whole Index)
00160         {
00161             return ChildWindows[Index].second;
00162         }
00163 
00164         Whole MenuWindow::GetNumChildMenuWindows()
00165         {
00166             return ChildWindows.size();
00167         }
00168 
00169         void MenuWindow::DestroyChildMenuWindow(MenuWindow* ToBeDestroyed)
00170         {
00171             for ( std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> >::iterator it = ChildWindows.begin() ; it != ChildWindows.end() ; it++ )
00172             {
00173                 if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it).second )
00174                 {
00175                     Button* But = (*it).first;
00176                     DestroyButton(But);
00177                     delete ToBeDestroyed;
00178                     ChildWindows.erase(it);
00179                     return;
00180                 }
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }
00184 }
00185 
00186 #endif
